# File lib/json/editor.rb, line 71
71:     def Editor.question_dialog(window, text)
72:       dialog = MessageDialog.new(window, Dialog::MODAL, 
73:         MessageDialog::QUESTION, 
74:         MessageDialog::BUTTONS_YES_NO, text)
75:       dialog.show_all
76:       window.focus = dialog
77:       dialog.run do |response|
78:         return Gtk::Dialog::RESPONSE_YES === response
79:       end
80:     ensure
81:       dialog.destroy if dialog
82:     end
